messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Ok assshatsss, crime isss once again illegal. im here to kick asss and take namesss... maybe ssshake it up a lil and take asss and kick namesss?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We would like the crew to be notified, yes, we are laughing at you.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So you know, I have a 0 tolerance policy on capital crimes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Thisss isss HOSSS giving an official diplomatic requessst with "Blob", make your way to SSSEC if you wisssh to communicate cordially

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a swarm of squeaking things have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Technical Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Space Station 13. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.
